name: Labyrinth (itch) (Ricardo Garcia)
description:
Labyrinth It is a demo of an indie game (Survivor Horror) in the first person where you have to get out of the maze before time runs out or you're caught.

It contains traps, enemies and is set in different environments, Will you be able to get out of the maze or will you be trapped?

The project is still in development, as time goes by, new scenarios, enemies and new mechanics will be added.

I hope you like it if you have any suggestions feel free to send me a message, I hope you enjoy the game.

I would appreciate your support with your donation.

RECOMMENDED: Play it at night and with headphones

Extract the .rar file and run the .exe file
